sensuality.question:
Did I desire worldly experiences over growth in faith? 

Rephrased: Did I give priority to fleeting pleasures of this world over nourishing my spiritual life?

(I made minor changes to make it more applicable to the demographic, while maintaining the original question's intent and structure)
sensuality.description: Prioritizing worldly pleasures and experiences over spiritual development is considered sinful as it violates the First Commandment by placing temporal desires above one's eternal relationship with God.
